meanings.definition: The quality or state of being morally right or justifiable.
meanings.sent1: Her righteousnesses always guided her to make the right decisions.
meanings.sent2: His righteousnesses were evident in the way he treated others with kindness and respect.
meanings.sent3: The righteousnesses of the situation were clear, leading to a fair outcome for all.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of deceit, her righteousnesses shone like a beacon of truth.
meanings.sent5: The righteousnesses of his actions left a lasting impact on those around him.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that is morally right or justifiable.
meanings.sent1: The community praised her righteousnesses for standing up against injustice.
meanings.sent2: His righteousnesses were seen in his daily acts of kindness towards others.
meanings.sent3: The cat's righteousnesses in stealing treats from the dog amused the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her righteousnesses in always speaking the truth set her apart from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The righteousnesses of their teamwork led to great success in the project.
